definitions.text: a customs document listing the contents put on a ship or plane
provide evidence for; stand as proof of; show by one's behavior, attitude, or external attributes
examples: His high fever attested to his illness
The buildings in Rome manifest a high level of architectural sophistication
This decision demonstrates his sense of fairness

definitions.text: reveal its presence or make an appearance
examples: the ghost manifests each year on the same day

definitions.text: clearly revealed to the mind or the senses or judgment
examples: the effects of the drought are apparent to anyone who sees the parched fields
it is plain that he is no reactionary
